business.headline: RBI cuts Repo Rate by 25 points to 6% amid global trade warThe Reserve Bank of India has cut the repo rate by 25 basis points to 6%, potentially leading to lower EMIs for home loans. The RBI has also lowered the GDP forecast for FY26 to 6.5% from the earlier 6.7%. The Monetary Policy Committee unanimously decided to change the stance from neutral to accommodative, hinting at possible further easing. The RBI Governor expressed concerns over global trade uncertainties and their potential impact on inflation and growth.

Cheaper home, auto loan EMIs after RBI rate cut. What it means for youRBI reduces key lending rate to 6%. Lower interest rates are expected to make borrowing cheaper, which can help people buy homes or vehicles more easily.

RBI changes stance from neutral to accommodative: What does it mean?The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Sanjay Malhotra has announced a cut in the repo rate by 25 basis points, bringing it down from 6.25% to 6%.

RBI downgrades 2025-26 GDP forecast to 6.5% from 6.7% amid global tariff warWhile sharing the new projections, Governor Sanjay Malhotra said the downward revision of the GDP forecast was mainly due to growing risks in global trade and policy developments.

Donald Trump's 26% reciprocal tariffs on India come into effectA 26% tariff on Indian exports to the USA has come into effect. Key sectors impacted include electronics, gems and jewellery, auto components, and agricultural products. The Union Cabinet is set to meet to discuss India's strategy and the impact on exporters. The Indian government is in touch with exporters to minimise the impact, while also working on a bilateral trade agreement with the US.

Home loans to get cheaper as RBI cuts key lending rates by 25 basis points to 6%RBI MPC meeting: This is the second rate cut in a row, following a 25 basis point reduction in February. RBI also changed its earlier stance from neutral to 'accommodative'.

Trump's 26% tariffs on India come into effect, big Cabinet meet todayWith markets in a free fall since Donald Trump's reciprocal tariff announcement, the Union Cabinet will hold a crucial meeting today to strategise on ways to minimise the impact.
Sensex, Nifty open lower as RBI policy and global cues weigh on investorsThe S&P BSE Sensex fell by 255.49 points to 73,971.59, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 86.70 points to 22,449.15 as of 9:22 am.

RBI MPC: Will home loans get cheaper after today's policy announcement?RBI MPC meeting: In its last meeting held in February, the RBI cut the repo rate by 25 basis points. This was the first rate cut under RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra, and also the first cut in nearly five years.

Stock market today: Will RBI MPC decision pause Sensex, Nifty rally?The Sensex and Nifty ended Tuesday's session with big gains, but a global sell-off and worries about trade tensions are expected to affect today's opening.

Stocks to watch on April 9: NTPC, Adani Wilmar, Vodafone Idea, BPCLIn today's trade, many shares will be in focus due to key news developments. These include NTPC, BPCL, Adani Wilmar, Vodafone Idea, Cyient, PNB Housing Finance, and more.

S&P 500 hits lowest level in one year as hopes for Trump tariff relief fadeThe S&P 500 reached its lowest level in nearly a year after it reversed a strong morning rally, as hopes faded for any concessions or delays on President Donald Trump's global tariffs on US's trading partners set to come into effect on April 9.

US markets gain sharply on hopes of tariff talks: Will Dalal Street continue rally?If Wall Street wraps up today's session on a strong note, it could deliver a big dose of confidence to investors worldwide, especially in Asian markets.

US markets rally as Dow Jones jumps 1,100 points, Nasdaq, S&P surge 3%The surge in US stocks came as investors looked for any indication that the US might be open to easing some of its tougher tariffs through negotiations.

Opting for new tax regime? Know about this Rs 7,000 post office savings benefitAs per a government notification issued back in 2011, interest from post office savings accounts is exempt under Section 10(15) of the Income Tax Act.

Sensex, Nifty end higher on global recovery and RBI rate cut expectationsThe S&P BSE Sensex added 1,089.18 points to close at 74,227.08, while the NSE Nifty5o gained 374.25 points to end at 22,535.85.

RBI MPC to announce decision on April 9: Will there be a rate cut?Since the last MPC meeting, held in February 2025, a lot of things have changed, both positive and negative. While inflation has come down, and growth has started to pick up, there are fresh worries about the global economy.

'Economic nuclear war': Billionaire business titans slam Trump's tariff gambitDonald Trump's tariff agenda is fracturing elite support, with top businessmen — from Bill Ackman to Jamie Dimon — warning it risks recession, inflation, and global instability.

Hotmail co-founder Sabeer Bhatia on Indian engineers: '99% start giving gyaan'Sabeer Bhatia pointed out that in India, people respect those who talk business, not those who write code or build software. This mindset, he says, is stopping India from becoming a hub of innovation.

Sensex up 1,600 points: Which stocks are driving the rally on Dalal Street?Markets saw a huge rebound from yesterday's crash as they staged a robust recovery as no stocks on the Sensex of Nifty50 traded in red in the afternoon session.

Trump's tariff war may backfire, says JPMorgan CEO, urges stronger India tiesJPMorgan CEO, Jamie Dimon, explained that higher costs of imported goods would affect consumers, while increased demand for local products could also drive prices up.

Unified Pension Scheme: Centre studying global models to manage UPS pool corpusThe government aims to create proper rules for investing the extra contribution made by it in a separate pension fund called the pool corpus under the newly launched Unified Pension Scheme (UPS).

Japan's Nikkei leads Asia's recovery as hopes rise for softer tariff approachA 5.6% rebound in Japan's Nikkei far outpaced other regional markets, with Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and Trade Representative Jamieson Greer tasked with leading trade negotiations with Tokyo.

Explained: Why Titan share price jumped 7% after hitting 52-week lowThe recovery in Titan share price came just a day after the stock touched its 52-week low of Rs 2,947.55. In the morning session, Titan shares climbed to a high of Rs 3,222, providing some relief to investors after a tough few months.

Sensex, Nifty in green: Why is stock market rising today? 3 things to knowSensex, Nifty today: Tracking global markets that showed signs of recovery, Sensex and Nifty surged more than 1.5% in early trade, shaking off fears that had weighed heavily just a day earlier, with early buying seen across most sectors.
Sensex, Nifty gain as global markets recover from Trump's tariff shockThe S&P BSE Sensex surged 1,217.78 points to 74,355.68, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 380.50 points to 22,542.10 as of 9:35 am.
Global markets show signs of recovery. Will Sensex and Nifty gain today?A slight improvement in global markets, especially in the US and Asia, has brought some hope after the recent sell-off.

Stocks to watch on April 8: M&M, BEL, Adani Ports, Tata Motors, TitanInvestors are likely to keep a close eye on Tuesday's market, looking for signs of a rebound. Asian markets opened higher, offering some relief after a choppy session in the US.

Wall Street's fear gauge spikes, stocks sink as Trump stands firm on tariffsWall Street equities have been hammered since US President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, announced on April 2, on all imports into the US and much higher levies on some major trading partners.

How market reacted briefly to Donald Trump tariff pause rumourA misinterpreted comment about Trump pausing tariffs briefly sent markets soaring before crashing. Social media spread the false claim, prompting a quick White House denial that ended the short-lived rally.

Wall Street slides again on tariff fears; will Sensex, Nifty follow suit?Wall Street remained weak on Monday, with all three major indexes falling for a third straight session. The drop came after US President Donald Trump announced a new round of heavy tariffs on imports, which led to retaliation from major trade partners, including China.

S&P 500 rebounds after early trade fall in volatile US market sessionThe S&P 500 has dropped 20% from its peak closing level reached in February. If it finishes at this level or lower, it would officially mark the start of a bear market from February onward.

LPG cylinder prices hiked by Rs 50 for both subsidised, non-subsidised consumersThe government has hiked LPG prices to recover past losses, pushing up household cooking costs at a time of rising economic uncertainty and global trade tensions.

After Trump, EU wants India to remove tariffs on car imports: ReportThe European Union is pressing India to eliminate steep import tariffs on automobiles under a long-delayed trade deal , with India signalling a willingness to offer more attractive terms.

Sensex closes 2,200 points lower as Dalal Street logs worst session in 10 monthsStock market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 2226.79 points lower at 73,137.90, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 742.85 points to trade at settle at 22,161.60. Most of the broader market indices also crashed during the extremely volatile trading session.

Excise duty on petrol, diesel increased by Rs 2; no impact on consumersThe move comes at a time when global crude oil prices are actually on a downward trend, driven by fears of a global trade war sparked by the US administration's reciprocal tariffs.

Apple flies iphones from India and China to dodge Trump's tariffs: ReportApple is closely studying how different tariff rules in various countries could impact its supply chain. The US remains one of Apple's key markets, and the company is trying to avoid passing on higher costs to customers.

$10 billion wiped out: India's richest 4 take a hit in stock market crashThe country's top four billionaires, Mukesh Ambani, Gautam Adani, Savitri Jindal & family, and Shiv Nadar, together lost over $10 billion as markets around the world fell sharply.

What is 'Black Monday' stock market crash? Know why it's making headlines againOn Friday, April 4, 2025, the US stock market had its worst day since the Covid-19 crash. More than $5 trillion was erased in a matter of hours as stocks plummeted, and volatility soared.

Stock market crash: What should investors do as Trump tariffs batter portfolios?Dalal Street is bleeding as global turmoil deepens amid Trump's tariff shock. Read on to find out what investors should do now amid the chaos and confusion.

entertainment.headline: Robert Pattinson in talks for Denis Villeneuve's star-studded Dune 3 cast: ReportDenis Villeneuve is considering Robert Pattinson for a role in the upcoming Dune: Messiah film. The potential casting adds to the star-studded lineup including Timothee Chalamet and Zendaya.

Director Pa Ranjith faces Internet's wrath for working with MeToo-accused actorDirector Pa Ranjith was questioned by internet users for working with MeToo-accused actor John Vijay. Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi President Thol Thirumavalavan shared a photo with Ranjith and his team after meeting them at Tiruchi airport.

Bazooka pre-release teaser: Mammootty packs a punch in Deeno Dennis's thrillerAhead of the highly anticipated release of Bazooka, the makers have unveiled a pre-release teaser, further adding to the growing buzz. The thriller stars superstar Mammootty, Gautham Vasudev Menon, and others.

Akshay Kumar stuns as Kathakali dancer in new look from Kesari 2Akshay Kumar shared a picture of himself dressed as a Kathakali dancer ahead of the release of Kesari 2. In the film he will be portraying the role of C Sankaran Nair, a lawyer and statesman.

Kajol opens up about daughter Nysa's Bollywood plansBuzz about Ajay Devgn and Kajol's daughter Nysa making her Bollywood debut has been circulating online. However, Kajol recently put an end to the rumours by addressing them at a public event.

L2 Empuraan box office: Mohanlal, Prithviraj's film slows down on Day 13L2: Empuraan Box Office Day 13: The Prithviraj Sukumaran and Mohanlal-starrer has entered the Rs 100 crore nett club in India. However, the action film saw a dip in its day-wise earnings on its second Tuesday.

Tamannaah dodges personal question about 'Vijay' amid breakup rumoursAt the Odela 2 trailer launch, Tamannaah Bhatia engaged in a playful banter with a reporter. Her witty reply to a cheeky question about her personal life drew laughter from the audience.

Chiranjeevi heads to Singapore with Pawan Kalyan after his son's fire injuryMegastar Chiranjeevi and his wife Surekha jetted off to Singapore with Andhra Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan on Tuesday. Pawan Kalyan's son, Mark Shankar, was injured in a school fire in Singapore.

Good Bad Ugly director admits his life changed after meeting 'rare gem' Ajith KumarGood Bad Ugly director Adhik Ravichandran opened up about his life after meeting Ajith Kumar. In a candid interview, he shared how the actor turned the spotlight on him.

Smriti Irani to make comeback in Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi? Ektaa Kapoor hintsDid filmmaker Ektaa Kapoor just confirm Smriti Irani's return to Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi reboot? Seems like the actor-turned-politician will make her much-awaited TV comeback after 15 years.

Allu Arjun-Atlee's poster copied from Dune? Internet points out similaritiesAllu Arjun and director Atlee's project was announced on Tuesday, on the occasion of the actor's birthday. However, the internet has pointed out that one of the posters of the film was allegedly copied from 'Dune'.

Priyanka Chopra, Nick Jonas kiss at his Broadway debut. Don't miss Malti's giftPriyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas shared a passionate kiss at his Broadway debut, 'The Last Five Years'. Their daughter, Malti, gifted a handmade poster for her father.
Producer Salim Akhtar, who launched Rani Mukerji, diesProducer Salim Akhtar died on April 8. He is survived by his wife, Shama Akhtar, and their son, Samad Akhtar.

Hulu outage hits thousands after Handmaid's Tale premiereHulu experienced a major outage on April 8, affecting over 13,000 users. Login and streaming issues were reported after The Handmaid's Tale premiere. Hulu advised basic troubleshooting and device restarts.
Kunal Kamra 'would rather check into mental hospital' than be on Bigg BossComedian Kunal Kamra shared a post on social media and revealed that he has been approached for the new season of Bigg Boss.

Odela 2 trailer: Tamannaah Bhatia as Shiva Shakti is ready to take on evilTamannaah Bhatia-starrer Odela 2 trailer released today, April 8. The supernatural thriller by Sampath Nandi will release in theatres on April 17.

Malaika Arora stuns with her dance moves on Roop Suhana on Hip Hop India 2. WatchActor Malaika Arora impressed fans with her moves again in a new video. The actor is judging the show with Remo D'Souza.

Actor Tillotama Shome gets emotional over director's remark and proving him wrongActor Tillotama Shome recently recalled a director's remarks on money and how she proved him wrong. The actor, in an interview, got emotional while recalling the incident.

Lenin title glimpse: Akhil Akkineni breaks away from lover boy imageThe title glimpse of Akhil Akkineni's upcoming film Lenin was unveiled on his birthday by father and actor Nagarjuna. The one-minute teaser hints at a powerful comeback of the actor.

Piyush Goyal defends 'dukandaari' remark, blasts Congress for false narrativePiyush Goyal, who had compared Indian startups with their Chinese counterparts - praising China's strides in AI and deep-tech - said his intention was to push Indian entrepreneurs toward greater ambition, not belittle their efforts.

Pathetic, needy, dumb: Elon Musk quits livestream after being bullied by gamersElon Musk's livestream turns disastrous as he's trolled, dies repeatedly in-game, and rage-quits mid-flight while showcasing Starlink Wi-Fi.

This is how city-killer asteroid that could collide with the Moon looksAstronomers have now constructed a 3D model of asteroid 2024 YR4 using observations conducted by the Gemini South telescope in Chile.

Trump's tariff feud with US Senator turns personal: Smallest neck I've seenDonald Trump's remarks come as Adam Schiff cements his role as one of Trump's most vocal and unrelenting critics on economic policy, warning that the administration's aggressive tariff strategy is steering the nation toward what he has ominously dubbed a looming "Trump recession".

Namita Thapar links Adolescence to dangers of 70-hour workweek in post on parentingIn a powerful post on parenting, entrepreneur Namita Thapar explored the correlation between the popular Netflix show Adolescence and the dangers of a 70-hour workweek.

Boys will be boys: White House reacts to Musk vs Navarro tariff feudElon Musk labelled Trump adviser Peter Navarro a "moron" in response to his tariff remarks, but the White House dismissed the clash as merely a difference of opinion.

Philippine politician offers to sleep with 'single, fertile mothers'; faces flakThe controversy erupted when a video surfaced showing candidate Christian Sia offering to "sleep with" lonely, fertile single mothers.

India, China should stand together against US abuse of tariffs: Chinese officialChina urged India to stand united against escalating US tariffs under Trump. As the Trump administration announced a 104 per cent tariffs on Chinese goods, Beijing vowed retaliation, calling Washington's moves unilateral and illegitimate.

Here is why Google is paying some of its employees to do nothingGoogle is apparently paying some of its employees to do nothing so that they don't take up another job.

Pentagon chief vows to reclaim Panama Canal, China slams US blackmail'China has never taken part in the management or operation of the Panama Canal, nor has it interfered in issues' concerning the waterway, said the Chinese embassy, calling on Washington to halt 'blackmail' and 'plundering' of Panama and other countries in the region.

sports.headline: Real Madrid coach Ancelotti hopeful of Bernabeu comeback vs ArsenalAfter a heavy first-leg defeat to Arsenal, Carlo Ancelotti believes Real Madrid can still mount a comeback at the Bernabéu, banking on their historic resilience in Europe ahead of the decisive second leg on April 17.

PBKS vs CSK: BCCI punishes Glenn Maxwell for breaching IPL code of conductPunjab Kings all-rounder Glenn Maxwell was fined and handed a demerit point after breaching the IPL Code of Conduct during his side's win over CSK, becoming the sixth player this season to be penalised by the BCC.

Priyansh Arya is a bright prospect for India: Shashank praises PBKS youngsterPunjab Kings batter Shashank Singh praised Priyansh Arya after the young opener hit the fastest hundred by an uncapped player and the fifth-fastest hundred in IPL history.

CSK coach Fleming highlights positives after PBKS loss: We batted a bit betterChennai Super Kings coach Stephen Fleming highlighted his side's improved batting performance in Tuesday's narrow loss against Punjab Kings. However, the CSK coach slammed the team's poor fielding and bowling after their fourth consecutive IPL 2025 loss.

Shashank Singh credits Brian Lara for confidence booster after 52 vs CSKIPL 2025, PBKS vs CSK: Shashank Singh scored 52 runs off 36 balls as the Punjab Kings recorded their third win of the tournament after beating Chennai Super Kings by 18 runs on Tuesday in Mullanpur.

CSK lost on the field, top-order failures: coach Fleming after PBKS lossChennai Super Kings head coach Stephen Fleming blamed poor fielding and inconsistent top-order batting for the team's recent struggles, following their fourth consecutive defeat in IPL 2025 against a dominant Punjab Kings.

Didn't understand CSK's decision to retire Devon Conway: Michael ClarkeFormer Australia cricketer Michael Clarke slammed Chennai Super Kings (CSK) management's decision to retire out Devon Conway against Punjab Kings in Match 22 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Markram gives insights into plan to counter Varun Chakravarthy and Sunil NarineLucknow Super Giants (LSG) batter Aiden Markram gave insights into their plan to counter Sunil Narine and Varun Chakravarthy's threat in the game against Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR). Markram scored 47 (28) and added 99 runs for the first wicket with Mitchell Marsh as LSG beat KKR by four runs.

Samson's captaincy comeback had calming influence on squad: Shane BondRajasthan Royals (RR) assistant and fast bowling coach Shane Bond feels Sanju Samson's comeback as captain has had a calming influence on the entire team. education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
